channel.title: Something about emacs on Do sth. Slowly

item.title: Something About Emacs
item.description: In this series, I will write something about Emacs. motion commands of c-mode Keystokes Command name Action C-M-a beginning-of-defun Move to the beginning of the body of the function C-M-e end-of-defun Move to the end of the function C-M-h c-mark-function Put the cursor at the beginning of the function, the mark at the end C-c C-q c-indent-defun Indent the entire function according to indention style Eshell Mastering Eshell
